title: Is it Really Impossible to Make a Living as an Animator in Japan?
partialText: There have been numerous horror stories about working as a newbie animator in Japan—namely, the inability to earn a living wage. To find out if this was still the case, ANN met freelance and studio-employed animators, studio heads, and animator-rights advocates.

title: Holy Boy Novel Review
partialText: I can already tell <i>Holy Boy</i> is one of those titles that is going to stay with me for a long time.
